body.name: BIGCOW Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Ultra-Slim Dual Nozzle (Frontal & Rear Wash) Hygienic Toilet Bidet, Fresh Cold Water Pressure Adjustable Bidet Attachment with Stainless Steel Inlet

features: 【Dual Spraying Modes】- This toilet bidet offers both rear wash for thorough cleaning and a specially designed frontal wash for women during their period or for pregnant mothers, promoting a healthy, hygiene-conscious, and environmentally friendly lifestyle.

【Ultra-Thin Design】- At less than a quarter inch thick, this bidet attachment fits comfortably with standard toilets without the need to lift the seat, ensuring a seamless and aesthetically pleasing look.

【Easy-to-Use Controls】- With an easy-grip knob, you can adjust the water pressure and spraying mode to your liking, making it ideal for those with mobility issues. Experience the refreshing feeling of a shower with just a turn of a knob.

【Leak-Proof and Lead-Free】- Made with all stainless steel water connecting parts, this bidet attachment ensures no leakage and is lead-free, promoting a healthy and hygienic experience compared to traditional bidets with plastic/brass parts.

【Premium Butt Shower】- Upgrade your bathroom experience and enjoy a cleaner and more refreshing version of yourself with the magic of water spraying. Say goodbye to just wiping with toilet paper and hello to a premium butt shower experience with BIGCOW.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value for money, easy to install :: A Game-Changer for Personal Hygiene! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
reviews.reviewText: As someone who was skeptical about bidet attachments for toilets, I must say, I am now a firm believer, thanks to this fantastic Bidet Attachment! This little device has completely revolutionized my bathroom experience and hygiene routine.Installation was a breeze! I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to set up. The package came with clear instructions, and within minutes, I had it securely attached to my toilet. No need for expensive plumbing alterations or a professional plumber – it's that straightforward!The construction of this bidet attachment is sturdy and of high quality. It feels like it will last for years to come, providing peace of mind regarding durability. The design is minimalistic, complementing the aesthetics of my bathroom without being obtrusive.The adjustable water pressure and nozzle positioning are game-changers! I love the customizable options that allow me to set the water pressure just the way I like it. It provides a gentle and thorough cleansing experience, promoting a cleaner feeling compared to using toilet paper alone.Another fantastic feature is the self-cleaning nozzle. After each use, it automatically rinses itself, which ensures proper hygiene and maintenance without any hassle. The bidet attachment also comes with a convenient control panel, allowing easy access to various functionalities.Not only does using this bidet attachment reduce my environmental impact, but it also saves me money on toilet paper in the long run. It's eco-friendly and cost-effective, making it an even more attractive option.I initially worried about potential leakage, but I'm happy to report that this Bidet Attachment has a reliable anti-leak system. It has given me no trouble, and I can trust it to remain watertight during use.I'm not exaggerating when I say this attachment has transformed my bathroom habits and overall hygiene. The cleanliness and refreshing feeling it provides are unparalleled. I now wonder how I ever managed without it!To sum it up, this Bidet Attachment for Toilet is a game-changer! Easy to install, easy to use, and easy to maintain. It has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their bathroom experience and embrace better personal hygiene. You won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works GREAT! and so affordable.
reviews.reviewText: Since having a disabled person at home I thought it affordable help in self care. If it didn't work out , no matter. However, it was so easy to install, I didn't need a handy-person, I could do it myself. It's so slim that it fits under our nice, new, slow-shut toilet seat. Discreetly, the wand sprayer is hidden until you choose to use- for front or back. It isn't electrified so our high electric bill won't go up, it doesn't glow in the dark-who wants a glowing toilet? It doesn't play music or require a specialized seat costing several hundred dollars! ( who wants to invest so much when you want a new seat every so often anyway) In short, the BigCow is so a Big Wow! I actually take company into our bathroom and tell them how great it is and how affordable. It's true the water isn't warm but so what? Get it, you'll be glad you did

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clean your undercarriage
reviews.reviewText: It's a very basic bidet. It is easy to install, just make sure you thread it straight. If it's off, it'll leak. It comes with everything you need, except tools of course. It had plumbers tape, and even feet to help if the bidet attachment causes the seat to be elevated. The bumper feet would keep the seat from pinching you. I didn't need it. It fit flat under the seat and works perfect. The nob needs to be turned just a bit, as the pressure can be high. It is a cold water bidet, but its just from the faucet, it's not like ice water. It's really not bad and makes me feel much cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good starter bidet, easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This is my second bidet, so I have some experience using them and have been doing so since the great toilet paper crises of 2020.This one came with absolutely everything I need to install, including the nylon tape, and the plumbing parts were higher quality than I was expecting. The instructions were clear and I had no issues installing it (beyond getting behind my toilet), and I have had zero leaks in the nearly two months since I've been using it. I also love that my toilet seat isn't propped up at a bad angle like with my previous bidet, and it sits nice and flush (no pun intended) as it was meant to.The only thing I have to be careful of with it is when I first open the spout to the first "click" (by turning the knob), the water is a bit sharp, and I have to back it down halfway for my most sensitive areas. Opening it half way doesn't start the stream, so I have to open it fully and then close it a little so its comfortable. This could be due to my homes water pressure possibly, but I cannot be certain.Overall, this is an efficient little bidet and would be a great option for anyone who wanted to try one out! We go through toilet paper half as fast as we used to, so it has helped us save a lot of money. I would recommend a nice, thick, low-lint premium toilet paper to pat dry, as a little goes a long way, and you'll still be saving money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable & Works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I hate when people say it's easy to do because when I run into problems I get pissed. Was a little challenging to set up because there is 0 space between my tub and water valve & connection. There just wasn't a lot of space for me to unscrew and screw things together. The design of the product is very simple and things aren't unnecessarily complicated but difficulty of installation depends on your bathroom layout.As far as the product goes, I love it. The water does come out like a fire hydrant if you're not careful but I really don't mind thay part at all . It does what it was built to do and that's all I ask for when buying something

I was pleasantly shocked when this item arrived. I have to admit, I didn’t have high hopes especially considering the very fair pricing. I was so wrong!!! Very very easy to install. Straightforward easy to follow illustrated instructions. Not only were the instructions easy to follow, they were so very accurate!! It is surprisingly well made, sturdy item. Easy to operate and very effective!!! I absolutely highly recommend this bidet!
Shipping was prompt, installation was a breeze. Use is very simple and easy, pressure is quite high so I only need the nozzles open 25-50%. Glad I bought it!
Este artículo, viene con todo lo necesario para su instalación, es de buena calidad, lo recomiendo para ahorrar en papel higiénico.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow, works well and it's a perfect way to use less toilet paper!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this bidet for about 2 months now and love it!! It was easy to install on my own and didn't take me long at all. I've been wanting one for years now and so glad I bought this when it went on sale. I bought microfibre cloths to dry myself after the wash so I can use less toilet paper and save money. And these cloths are washable, so I bought enough to last 1 week and sanitise them in the washer.I don't mind the cold water except in the middle of the night when I'm half asleep. At first, it's a bit of a shock, but I quickly got used to it. The controls hits the right spots all the time and I love that I can control the amount of water spraying out. I feel so much cleaner using this.I have recommended this bidet to several friends to tell them how to get cleaner and go toilet paper-less. I totally recommend this to you.
